title: AudioPolicyService crashes
content:
Since the 11 update, AudioPolicyService crashes constantly, making any audio unlistenable and unusable.

I guess there needs to be a question........

Can you reset/reinstall/fix a component?

The obvious answer is to factory reset the phone, and take a weekend getting it back in working order, and plan to do that every 6 months or so.

Is there a way to do that without spending hours of unpaid labor working for the developer/manufacturer of this extremely expensive device that they broke?

The obvious answer is, as ridiculous as it is, it's a minor frustration from any reasonable perspective.

Google, you suck. Make your s7it better.
